heading: 4. The 1st day of October 2022 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
4. The 1st day of October 2022 is appointed as the day on which the 

following provisions of the Act of 2022 shall come into operation: 

(a) 

(b) 

section 7, and 

section 8, in so far as it relates to the insertion of section 16A 
into the Consumer Insurance Contracts Act 2019 (No. 53 of 
2019).

title: 3. The 8th day of July 2022 is appointed as the day on which the Act of
heading: 5. The 1st day of January 2023 is appointed as the day on which the Act
text_raw:
5. The 1st day of January 2023 is appointed as the day on which the Act 

of 2022, in so far as it is not already in operation, shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

7 July, 2022. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 12th July, 2022.
